## True or False

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(webexercises)

cat("1.", fitb("T", num = FALSE), "An underwriter is an investment bank that manages the IPO process and helps the company sell its stock.\n\n")
cat("2.", fitb("F", num = FALSE), "An initial public offering (IPO) is not necessarily the first time a company sells its stock to the public.\n\n")
cat("3.", fitb("F", num = FALSE), "Underwriters face no risk during an IPO, so that a greenshoe provision is usually not necessary.\n\n")
cat("4.", fitb("T", num = FALSE), "New issues are highly cyclical.\n\n")
cat("5.", fitb("F", num = FALSE), "The transaction costs of an IPO are usually low.\n\n")
```
